attributes.action: Reduce the total number of MP's and Lords in Parliament to minimise costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I request that the government should reduce its numbers of MP's and members of the house of Lords by 50% and thus the government costs. All associated costs for the maintenance of MP's, government departments  and their staff should be reduced accordingly. Savings estimated to be in excess of £1bn per year

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
